description: Jar is India's fastest growing micro-savings app that helps users save small amounts daily and invest in digital gold. We make saving as easy and habitual as your daily coffee.

products.Daily Savings: Save small amounts daily starting from just ₹1
products.Digital Gold: Convert your savings into 24K digital gold
products.Jar App: Mobile-first platform with intuitive saving features
products.Auto-Save: Set up automatic daily savings from your UPI

pricing.Withdrawal: Small processing fee for gold redemption

faq.question: What is Jar?
faq.answer: Jar is a micro-savings app that helps you save small amounts daily and convert them into digital gold, making saving a daily habit.

faq.question: How does Jar work?
faq.answer: You can save any amount starting from ₹1 daily. Your savings are automatically converted into digital gold, which you can accumulate or redeem anytime.

faq.question: Is there any minimum amount to start?
faq.answer: No, you can start saving with as little as ₹1. There's no minimum balance requirement.

faq.question: How much does Jar cost?
faq.answer: Opening an account is completely free. There are no charges for saving or storing gold. A small processing fee applies only when you redeem physical gold.

faq.question: Is my money safe with Jar?
faq.answer: Yes, your digital gold is stored securely with regulated partners and is fully insured. Jar is compliant with all RBI regulations.

faq.question: Can I withdraw my money anytime?
faq.answer: Yes, you can redeem your digital gold for cash or physical gold delivery anytime through the app.

faq.question: What is digital gold?
faq.answer: Digital gold represents physical 24K gold that you own. Each unit in your Jar account corresponds to actual gold stored in secure vaults.

faq.question: Do you have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Yes, Jar is available as a mobile app on both iOS and Android platforms.
